description: Capacity Strengthening Team of Rural Employment Opportunity for Public Assets (REOPA) Project.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

subproject.description:
a)  Raise project participants, elected members'/representatives, Union Facilitation Team, Women Development Forum and Union Parishad members’,  upazila and district level government officials’ awareness on human and legal rights with special focus on violence against women and related contemporary issues.
b)  Activate and capacitate the UP Standing Committee on “Women and Child Welfare, Cultural and Sports” to act as the focal point and also the DLAC to ensure legal services to victims and poor.
c)  Establish linkages between REOPA members with existing forums, UP and others as well UP-SC, human rights organizations, Women wing of Bangladesh Union Parishad Forum (BUPF) at the national and district levels and the DLAC to ensure rights and privileges of women in the project areas
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH

subproject.title: Violence Against Women - JP

subproject.description: The Initiation Plan aims at supporting the preparation for the proposed Comprehensive Social Protection Project (CSPP) and addresses Government's request for supporting reform efforts within the policy domain.
